title: Audit a New Product Launch
description: An auditor reviews a recently completed new product launch to determine if the project met its objectives.

tasks.description: Compare the final project cost and timeline to the original budget and plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor determines the project was 20% over budget and 3 months late.

tasks.description: Compare the actual sales in the first six months to the sales targets set in the business case.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor finds that sales are at only 50% of the target.

tasks.description: Interview the product manager to understand the reasons for the shortfalls and document lessons learned for future projects.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor documents key takeaways to improve future product launches.
